vlive.korean: 정국 씨 - 아니 그거를 몸으로 표현하면 여기 사람들이 어떻게 봅니까? Jung Kook. - How do you expect people to see it if you use body language? 듣기 View video BTS : 꿀FM <지진정의 R.A.D.I.O 라디오> #중대발표
vlive.english: Jung Kook. - How do you expect people to see it if you use body language?

vlive.korean: 초반에 표현법이 굉장히 좋았어요 - 그러면 하나만 더 지켜볼까요? I was really impressed with your expressiveness. - Shall we watch another one? 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [GOING SEVENTEEN 2020] EP.24 드립 : 세븐틴 갓 탤런트 #2 (Ad-lib : Seventeen's got Talent #2)
vlive.english: I was really impressed with your expressiveness. - Shall we watch another one?

vlive.korean: 표현하는 거예요 - 이건 혹시 펜 잘 나오나 안 나오나 확인한 건가요? I'm expressing it. - Were you trying to find out if the pen had enough ink? 듣기 View video Dispatch : [ⓓxV] “셉카소를 찾아라” ② (보컬팀 : SEVENTEEN)
vlive.english: I'm expressing it. - Were you trying to find out if the pen had enough ink?

vlive.korean: 형 이 맛을 표현을 하자면? If you express the taste with a dance move? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : "네 손님" 어서오십시오 필릭스네 식당입니다!👨‍🍳
vlive.english: If you express the taste with a dance move?

vlive.korean: 이게 뭐예요? - 저거 어떻게 표현하지? What is this? - How do you express that? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [3년 전 오늘의 VICTON] 정말 즐거운 💛내 마음을 잡아줘💙야~ (VICTON’s Drawing Quiz 3years ago)
vlive.english: What is this? - How do you express that?

examples.korean: She expresses her individuality through her clothes. 발음듣기 그녀는 옷을 통해 개성을 표현한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She expresses her individuality through her clothes. 발음

examples.korean: Some people are more demonstrative than others. 발음듣기 어떤 사람들은 다른 사람들보다 애정[감정] 표현이 더 개방적이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Some people are more demonstrative than others. 발음

examples.korean: There was no fatherly affection, no display of sentiment. 발음듣기 아비의 애정도 감상의 표현도 없었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: There was no fatherly affection, no display of sentiment. 발음

examples.korean: strictures against civil servants expressing political opinions 발음듣기 공무원의 정치적 의견 표현에 대한 제한 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: strictures against civil servants expressing political opinions 발음

examples.korean: The beauty of the scene defies description. 발음듣기 그 광경의 아름다움은 필설로는 도저히 표현할 수가 없다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The beauty of the scene defies description. 발음
